title: Invoice explanation
content: Your invoice may include subscription fees, add-ons, usage-based charges, roaming, and one-time fees.

title: Payment methods
content: You can pay your invoice by e-invoice, card, or direct debit from your bank account.

title: Cancel contract
content: You can cancel your contract via the self-service portal under 'My subscription' or by calling customer support.

title: EU roaming
content: Within the EU/EEA, you can usually use your domestic allowance. Fair usage limits and speed restrictions may apply.

title: Network troubleshooting
content: If you experience connectivity issues, restart your device, toggle airplane mode, or check our network status page.
